items.sentence: Tom was completely surprised by Mary\'s offer.
Tom doesn\'t have to worry about Mary anymore.
You\'ve ruined my chances of becoming popular.
What\'s your favorite thing to have for lunch?
Tom wouldn\'t let anybody do anything for him.
Tom wouldn\'t share his secret recipe with me.
I should\'ve done that while I had the chance.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary will enjoy doing that.
Tom doesn\'t know about those kinds of things.
I never thought that I\'d want to buy an iPad.
